title: Dispose of Obsolete Inventory
description: A product has been discontinued and the remaining stock is deemed obsolete. It needs to be disposed of.

tasks.description: An analyst identifies a product with no sales for over a year and a 'Discontinued' status.
Management approves the disposal of the remaining stock.
tasks.expected_outcome: Authorization is given to write off the inventory.

tasks.description: An inventory adjustment is created to remove the stock from the system, using 'Obsolete Disposal' as the reason.
tasks.expected_outcome: The inventory is removed from the system records.

tasks.description: A work order is created for the warehouse team to physically remove the product from the shelves and place it in the disposal area.
tasks.expected_outcome: The physical product is handled correctly for disposal.
